days.text: Humid. Cloudy. Mist. Occasional showers. Possible thunderstorms later. Force 2 to 3 south to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Occasional showers. Possible thunderstorms at first. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few showers at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
